channel.description: Specifies the channels agents can handle in the Contact Control Panel (CCP) for this routing profile. Valid values are `VOICE`, `CHAT`, `TASK`.

delay.description: Specifies the delay, in seconds, that a contact should be in the queue before they are routed to an available agent

priority.description: Specifies the order in which contacts are to be handled for the queue.

queueId.description: Specifies the identifier for the queue.
